Package wav

Class WavHeader

java.lang.Object
wav.WavHeader
public class WavHeader extends Object
WavHeader The canonical WAV file header format.
Author:
Jasminder Garcha

  • Field Details

    • wavHeaderHexString

      public String wavHeaderHexString
      The WAV file header hexadecimal string.

    • CHUNK_ID

      public static final int CHUNK_ID
      Chunk Id. Contains the letters "RIFF" in ASCII form (0x52494646 big-endian form). Offset 0 bytes. Size 4 bytes. "RIFF" chunk descriptor with chunk size and format.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CHUNK_ID_HEXSTRING

      public static final String CHUNK_ID_HEXSTRING
      Chunk Id hexadecimal string.

    • chunkSize

      public int chunkSize
      Chunk size. Offset 4 bytes. Size 4 bytes. Little endian.

    • chunkSizeHexString

      public String chunkSizeHexString
      Chunk size hexadecimal string.

    • FORMAT

      public static final int FORMAT
      Format. Contains the letters "WAVE" (0x57415645 big-endian form). Offset 8 bytes. Size 4 bytes.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • FORMAT_HEXSTRING

      public static final String FORMAT_HEXSTRING
      Format hexadecimal string.

    • SUBCHUNK1_ID

      public static final int SUBCHUNK1_ID
      Subchunk 1 Id. Contains the letters "fmt" (0x666D7420 big-endian form). Offset 12 bytes. Size 4 bytes. The "fmt" subchunk describes the format of the sound information in the data subchunk.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SUBCHUNK1_ID_HEXSTRING

      public static final String SUBCHUNK1_ID_HEXSTRING
      Subchunk 1 Id hexadecimal string.

    • subchunk1Size

      public int subchunk1Size
      Subchunk 1 size. Offset 16 bytes. Size 4 bytes. Little endian.

    • subchunk1SizeHexString

      public String subchunk1SizeHexString
      Subchunk 1 size hexadecimal string.

    • audioFormat

      public int audioFormat
      Audio format. 1 is PCM. Offset 20 bytes. Size 2 bytes. Little endian.

    • audioFormatHexString

      public String audioFormatHexString
      Audio format hexadecimal string.

    • numberOfChannels

      public int numberOfChannels
      Number of channels. 1 is mono, 2 is stereo. Offset 22 bytes. Size 2 bytes. Little endian.

    • numberOfChannelsHexString

      public String numberOfChannelsHexString
      Number of channels hexadecimal string.

    • sampleRate

      public int sampleRate
      Sample rate. Offset 24 bytes. Size 4 bytes. Little endian.

    • sampleRateHexString

      public String sampleRateHexString
      Sample rate hexadecimal string.

    • byteRate

      public int byteRate
      Byte rate. = SampleRate * NumChannels * BitsPerSample/8. Offset 28 bytes. Size 4 bytes. Little endian.

    • byteRateHexString

      public String byteRateHexString
      Byte rate hexadecimal string.

    • blockAlign

      public int blockAlign
      Block align. = NumChannels * BitsPerSample/8. Offset 32 bytes. Size 2 bytes. Little endian.

    • blockAlignHexString

      public String blockAlignHexString
      Block align hexadecimal string.

    • bitsPerSample

      public int bitsPerSample
      Bits per sample. Offset 34 bytes. Size 2 bytes.

    • bitsPerSampleHexString

      public String bitsPerSampleHexString
      Bits per sample hexadecimal string.

    • SUBCHUNK2_ID

      public static final int SUBCHUNK2_ID
      The "data" subchunk indicates the size of the sound information and contains the raw sound data. Subchunk 2 Id. Contains the letters "data" (0x64617461 big-endian form). Offset 36 bytes. Size 4 bytes.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SUBCHUNK2_ID_HEXSTRING

      public static final String SUBCHUNK2_ID_HEXSTRING
      Subchunk 2 Id hexadecimal string.

    • subchunk2Size

      public int subchunk2Size
      Subchunk 2 size. = NumSamples * NumChannels * BitsPerSample/8. Offset 40 bytes. Size 4 bytes.

    • subchunk2SizeHexString

      public String subchunk2SizeHexString
      Subchunk 2 size hexadecimal string.

  • Constructor Details

    • WavHeader

      public WavHeader(String wavHeader) throws Exception
      Parses the WAV file header.
      Parameters:
      wavHeader - WAV file header hexadecimal string.
      Throws:
      Exception - The header does not match the canonical WAV file format.

    • WavHeader

      public WavHeader(File wavFile) throws Exception
      Parses the WAV file header
      Parameters:
      wavFile - WAV file header hexadecimal string.
      Throws:
      Exception - The header does not match the canonical WAV file format

    • reverseBytes

      public String reverseBytes(String hexString)
      Reverses a string in chunks of two characters, bytes in a hexadecimal string. Converts a hexadecimal string from big endian to little endian.
      Parameters:
      hexString - Hexadecimal string.
      Returns:
      String reversed in chunks of two characters, bytes in a hexadecimal string. Hexadecimal string in little endian.
